attributes.review: This app is cursed, I opened it and all my crops died. I had a massive acne breakout, and started failing all my classes. Now my house is on fire and my parents are getting a divorce. I  pray the cruse doesn’t worsen. I fear I may have opened a Pandora’s Box filled to the brim with misfortunes. I can only hope that my mistake of downloading this app won’t  plague my family for generations.
attributes.title: Cursed

attributes.review: It’s the worst. Absolutely the worst.
attributes.title: Worst

attributes.review: 1/5 stars So when I downloaded it, it just kept I don’t know why so I kept refreshing it and nothing happened. I even deleted the app then downloaded it again but nothing worked.👎🏽😠

attributes.review: DONT GET THIS APP and this is why first When  I open this app it asks for my identification and I i sad who u think u is you creep I don’t date online and I almost had a heart attack ❤️because some Freddy croger looking man pop up on my screen  and I took my parent this man trying to kid nap me and and was trying to date me I was like I’m not no kid and I already took my nap who you think you is trying to ruin my sleep schedule 🌑😴and u want to date🤮—————now this is where stuff gets creepy five minutes later after downloading this app it was an burnt orange cockroach dancing on a striping poll at this point in my life I knew I did the wrong thing by downloading this app

attributes.review: I don’t think I could put my rage into words right now. I downloaded this app to get a better education/understanding about our president and country but it took hours to load and the entire time I was on the app I kept getting these obnoxious ads. 0/10, would not recommend
attributes.title: So disappointing

attributes.review: Don’t vote for trump..trust me..you’ll regret it if you do
